title: SideContentTable.fragment
content:
# SideContentTable.fragment.xml

```xml
<core:FragmentDefinition xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout" xmlns:f="sap.f" xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid" >
	<l:VerticalLayout width="100%">
		<!-- Search-Term: #SideContent -->
		<Title text="Side Content" id="SideContentTitle"/>
		<Button text="Change Criticality" press=".extension.sap.fe.showcase.lrop.ext.controller.RootEntityOPExtension.onChangeCriticality"/>
		<Text text="{description}"/>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</core:FragmentDefinition>

```
